segments.text: I see the lovely sunlight pouring in, creating shadows and warmth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that beauty is marred by the chaos unfolding inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink appears so calm and collected, unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s surprising how she doesn’t detect the overflow, water streaming freely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he’s about to take the biggest risk of his life for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel anger rise within me at the thought of him falling and no one noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches him with eager anticipation; it’s almost sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t shake the worry that this could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the tidy garden outside and the mess indoors is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what it would take for someone to notice the brewing disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
